at 225 Schermerhorn Street
OPENING APRIL 2011 ON-SITE LEASING OFFICE 718.943.8090
   
The Addison puts you at the center of the best of Brooklyn.  Set between the neighborhoods of Boerum Hill and Downtown, The Addison is contextually woven into the fabric of the neighborhood's charming, tree-lined brownstone blocks. 

Addison's intelligently designed, newly constructed residences offer smart layouts for free-spirited Brooklyn living.  An array of the borough's best restaurants, entertainment, and retailers are all within easy reach. 

Concierge, valet and housekeeping services keep your busy life in order. And the spacious members club, fitness center and roof deck allow you to stretch and socialize without ever leaving home.

item.title: 2 Bdrm Apt. w/ 2 Full Baths & 2 Balconies in a Full Service Condo Bldg (Downtown Brooklyn/Dumbo) $3500 2bd
item.description:
Bridge View Tower Condominium
189 Bridge Street, Brooklyn New York 11201
(Between Concord & Nassau Streets)

1,145 square feet 2 Bedrooms 2 Bathrooms 2 Balconies
Rental Price: $3,500.00/month
Available Immediately
To view a video of this unit, please click on the link below:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0O1CZ6xxmPE


Building Information:

We are located right at the foot of the Manhattan Bridge in Downtown Brooklyn: 18 stories, total of 59 units, with two levels of indoor parking and 1 retail space.

Minutes from Manhattan by car, we have a courtesy shuttle van which takes residents to 3 different train stations which allows them to access the A, C, F, M, N R, W, 2, 3, 4 & 5 trains. The closest subway station is about a 7 minute walk, 4 blocks away. You may also walk or bicycle over the bridge, which is about a 20 minute walk into Manhattan.

Amenities:

24 Hour concierge service
Dry cleaning service
Courtesy shuttle van
Refrigeration for Fresh Direct Food deliveries
Bicycle storage
On site parking
Gym
Outside Gardens
Barbecue Area

Each apartment has the following:

At least one balcony or terrace in each apartment
Hardwood Canadian Maple Floors
9 foot ceilings
Recessed lighting
Fantastic views of the Manhattan Skyline (Manhattan Bridge, Williamsburg Bridge, Empire State Building)
Stainless Steel Fridge
Stainless Steel Stove
Bosch Dishwasher
Washer/Dryer Unit in each apartment
Wine Cooler
Stainless Steel Microwave
Marble bathrooms


To schedule a viewing or for additional information, please call Crystal at 201.852.5883.


DIRECTIONS to Bridgeview Tower, 189 Bridge St. (between Concord & Nassau Streets):

By Subway:
From Manhattan, take last car of A, C or F to Jay St, Borough Hall, 2nd stop in Brooklyn, & exit via the
Metrotech exit on Jay St. Walk North on Jay St in the direction of Polytech University to Tillary St. Cross over Tillary St. and make a right onto Tillary St. Walk against traffic. At the next light, make a left onto Flatbush Ave Ext. Continue walking towards the Manhattan Bridge. Bridgeview Tower is located on thr right hand side of the Manhattan Bridge.

By Car from Manhattan via the Manhattan Bridge:
Take the 2nd exit (2nd turn off) from the right most lane of the Manhattan Bridge.Stay straight & continue to the first traffic light, this will be Jay Street. Make a left onto Jay Street,
continue straight until you reach the next traffic light. Make a left onto Tillary Street. Stay in the left most lane, At the traffic light, which will be Flatbush Avenue Ext., make a left. Continue in the direction of the Manhattan Bridge and stay in the right most lane. Before approaching the last traffic light before the Bridge, make a right onto Concord Street. Circle around the block in order to arrive at the front entrance Bridgeview Tower.

By Car from Manhattan via the Brooklyn Bridge
Take the Brooklyn Bridge until the very end. At the traffic light located on Tillary Street, make a left. Stay straight on Tillary Street. After you pass Jay Street, stay to the left most lane. At the traffic light, which will be Flatbush Avenue Ext., make a left. Proceed in the direction of the Manhattan Bridge, and stay in the right most lane. Before approaching the last traffic light before the Bridge, make a right onto Concord Street. Circle around the block in order to arrive at the front entrance Bridgeview Tower.

By Car from Queens or Brooklyn off the BQE:
Take the BQE and exit at the Tillary Street exit. Once exiting the ramp, you will be on Tillary Street. Stay straight, after passing the first traffic light, which is Gold Street on, merge to thr right most lane. Make a right at the next traffic light on Flatbush Avenue Ext. Proceed in the direction of the Manhattan Bridge, and stay in the right most lane. Before approaching the last traffic light before the Bridge, make a right onto Concord Street. Circle around the block in order to arrive at the front entrance Bridgeview Tower.


BridgeView Tower
189 Bridge Street
Brooklyn, NY 11201
Office: (718) 852-1088
